Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-27516 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-27516 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs18 is earlier than 18.20.3-5, affected by CVE-2025-27516
